text: Nambu kinyama kikale chenie ngikipukaligwa mateka pamwe na nnondoli ju uwangi jwakiba akalaya ikobo kupete kinyama chenie. Ku ikobo yenie, ngabakoloya abakiba babekigwe kiingi chi kinyama chenie, na angweto abagongalela kinyago chakwe. Kinyama kikale chenie pamwe na nnondoli ju wangi jwenio ngabalekeligwa boa abena, babi akammomi, nkati ja lilaba elijaka mwoto gwa mabwe ga baluti.
